RelatedSentence: The single - vehicle crash happened about 5:15 a.m. in the 4500 block of West Cermak , police said .
A passenger in the vehicle , a 29 - year - old woman , was taken to Mount Sinai Hospital in critical condition , police said .
The 28 - year - old man driving the SUV was also taken to Sinai Hospital in serious condition .
Police said alcohol may have played a role in the crash , and charges were pending against the driver Sunday morning .

CTA Route 21 buses were diverted off Cermak in the area as police investigated the crash .
